title: Ivory Minimalist Linen Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of an ivory white linen midi dress, A-line silhouette, short flutter sleeves, round neckline, subtle tonal stitching, concealed side zipper, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Ivory white linen midi dress with A-line silhouette, short flutter sleeves, round neckline, concealed side zipper, cotton lining for comfort, tonal stitching for a clean finish. Suitable for summer wear, breathable fabric, machine washable.
provenance: Inspired by the commercial trend of white tones in apparel, designed for manufacturability and versatility.
design_text:
Ivory Minimalist Linen Midi Dress (WHT001)
Colors: ivory white, soft cream, pearl
Fabrics: 100% linen, cotton lining
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short flutter sleeves
Neckline: round neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: concealed side zipper, tonal topstitching, soft cotton lining
Techpack: available
